scripts.dev: rm -rf dist/* && cp ./src/main.js ./src/appsscript.json ./dist && NODE_ENV=development parcel src/index.html --dist-dir dist -p 8000
scripts.start: rm -rf dist/* && cp ./src/main.js ./src/appsscript.json ./dist && NODE_ENV=production parcel src/index.html --dist-dir dist -p 8000
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && cp ./src/main.js ./src/appsscript.json ./dist && parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir dist
